dct_title_s: Mappa che dimostra Il Giro del centvrione intorno al mondo/ Gio Lapi In ; [Pope Da Hamly]
dct_description_sm: California shown as an unlabeled island with an indented northern coast. Depicts small islands between California and the North American continent.
Shows water route around the world.
Includes title cartouche at bottom left surrounded by figures from around the world.
Map is centered over Pacific Ocean, instead of the Atlantic as is more typical of this style of map.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
